artist: Manufacturer: Bradley and Hubbard, Meriden, Conn.
creditline: Gift of Kenneth and Sally Leafman Appelbaum
description: standing portly man with clock in his stomach; black cap and shoes, grey hair, green jacket, blue and black knickers; eyes move when clock runs
markings: on bottom, in relief: [BRADLEY & HUBBARD/ PATENTED JULY 14 1857]
medium: Iron and other metals, pigment, glass
title: Sea captain clock
